message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. Given its value and the benefits it offers, I'm proposing a starting price of $22,000. I'm open to discussing this further, so feel free to share your thoughts.

Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but given my budget constraints, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $14,000. I hope we can come to an agreement that works for both of us.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your budget constraints, but $14,000 is a bit too low for me to consider.  Could you do $19,000? This offer stands until tomorrow at noon.

Thank you for getting back to me, Alice. I've considered your latest offer, but unfortunately, it still exceeds my budget. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $16,000. I hope this aligns better with your expectations and we can move forward with the transaction.
